# BulkInsertSettings.MaxRecordsPerBatch property

Specifies the maximum number of records to insert per batch.

```csharp
public int? MaxRecordsPerBatch { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

If neither [`MaxParametersPerBatch`](MaxParametersPerBatch.md) nor `MaxRecordsPerBatch` are specified, the maximum number of parameters is 999.
